name: Flight Boredom
description:
Short prototype of a project I worked on. The concept is to recreate the feeling of  boredom I experienced on a 9 hour flight, with nothing to do and no real sense of time except for the setting sun. 

I haven't had a chance to test the MacOSX build, so if it does not work, please let me know!

Controls:

Mouse - look around

Esc - quit the game
